message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  That's a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $120. What do you think?
I understand that $180 was a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $160. This is my best price for now. What do you think?
Alice,  I appreciate you coming down, but $160 is still more than I'm willing to pay. I'll go up to $130.  If that doesn't work, I'll have to go with John.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell it to you for $145. This is my final offer before considering other options.
Alice, I really want this product, but $145 is still more than I can pay.  I'm going to stick with my last offer of $130.  If you can't do that, I'll have to go with John.
